rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that follows Vastu principles by ensuring proper light and open space. The positioning aligns with the main entrance, setting a positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Lobby
rooms.description: Central lobby area for guests, designed to integrate Bohemian aesthetics with comfortable seating and artistic decor elements. This space is well-connected to all adjoining rooms.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living area featuring natural light, Bohemian decor, and large windows on the south side for optimal sunlight as per Vastu guidelines. A mix of vibrant textiles and reclaimed wood finishes enhance the farmhouse vibe.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An airy dining space with large windows facing north for balanced light. Decor includes eclectic Bohemian elements such as colorful rugs and vintage decor pieces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet rustic kitchen design integrating traditional Indian cooking methods with modern appliances. The layout is designed following Vastu principles to maintain a smooth energy flow, including proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility space adjoining the kitchen for storage and work area. Designed with minimalistic Bohemian touches.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort. The room is positioned in the northeast corner to harness positive energy as per Vastu. It includes a private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with comfortable seating area integrated into the design, ensuring ample natural light and adherence to Vastu norms.

rooms.name: Family Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional family bedroom that can serve as a study or home office. The room's location is balanced with energy flow in mind according to Vastu principles.

openings.description: Grand main entrance with a welcoming design that aligns with Vastu principles for prosperity and positive energy.
Large windows placed strategically to ensure natural light throughout the house, enhancing both aesthetic and energy flow.
Private balcony offering views of the garden, designed to provide relaxation and connection with nature.

garden_access.description: Direct access from multiple living spaces to a large garden that spans over 60% of the plot area. The garden design incorporates local flora, water features for cooling, and designated seating areas in keeping with Bohemian aesthetics.
